attributes.action: Support motion for a General Election on 15 October 2019
attributes.additional_details: Parliament need to stop talking now and listen to the public and stop this ridiculous game playing and finally put an end to this. We stay or we leave let the people decide. The politicians are not trusted to continue speaking for the people. We now need to decide who we want in parliament and our futures please vote now if you agree we should have an election on 15 October 2019
attributes.background: The politicians discuss putting to the people's vote, but won't agree the election, is this not the people's referendum? Let people speak out and decide if they want an election and put it to parliament.
